definition: land of plenty/Heavenly province (epithet of Sichuan, esp. area around Chengdu)
day/sky/heaven
seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it
country/nation/state/national/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Guo

sentences.english: It selects top grade raw materials in the Land of Abundance, and is produced with our advanced techniques.
sentences.chinese: 精選天府之國優質原料，採用盈棚技術精工製作。

sentences.english: Sichuan has always enjoyed the reputation of the being “Heavenly Land of Plenty”.
sentences.chinese: 四川素有“天府之國”的美稱。

sentences.english: Szechwan is called the Heavenly Kingdom. There are lots of rich people there.
sentences.chinese: 四川是天府之國，那可富庶得很哪。

sentences.english: Sichuanalso has a nickname, Land of Abundance.
sentences.chinese: 四川還有一個別稱，天府之國。
